comment.author: 27398485@N08
comment._content: Romanticized drawing - art illustration of Abu Simbel Great Hall Osiride (Ramses II as Osiris) statues, knee deep in desert sand - perhaps as it would have been around 1813 when the western world discovered its existence along the Nile.  Pre-excavation.

comment.author: 64543286@N00
comment._content: What's on top of his head??
